sections.heading: intent.It is the intent of the Legislature to appropriate five hundred thousand dollars from the Nebraska Health Care Cash Fund annually beginning in fiscal year 2020-21 to the Brain Injury Assistance Program for purposes of carrying out the Brain Injury Assistance Act

sections.text:
71-3706.Legislative intent.

It is the intent of the Legislature to appropriate five hundred thousand dollars from the Nebraska Health Care Cash Fund annually beginning in fiscal year 2020-21 to the Brain Injury Assistance Program for purposes of carrying out the Brain Injury Assistance Act.

SourceLaws 2019, LB481, ยง 6;Laws 2022, LB971, ยง 5.
